narrative.narrative: Syphax Airlines is based at Sfax,Tunisia and has a secondary hub at Tunis. It was founded in 2011 and serves 4 domestic airports,4 in France,3 in the UK,3 in Libya,New York City, Istanbul,Casablanca,Ljubljana in Slovenia,Zagreb in Croatia, and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia as of 2014. Future plans are for Beijing,Montreal,Rio de Janeiro,Burkina Faso,and the Ivory Coast. As of late 2014 it had two A319's and a A330-200. It had three A320neo's on order and is the first African airline who have ordered the type.

prefereds.aircrafts: Airbus A319-100,Airbus A330-200,Airbus A320-200,Airbus A319neo,Airbus A320neo
